column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I have never had to ride a public bus until 4 years ago when I had no other transportation and was forced to take a public bus anywhere I needed to go .
#id=2
#text=The first thing I had to do was find a bus schedule and learn how to read the time and places to catch the bus and how to make any needed transfers .
#id=3
#text=This was a little hard to do but once I figured it out it was ok as long as I always kept a schedule with me .
#id=4
#text=I mostly took the bus to work and I only had to worry about catching one bus on the street I lived on and I did not have to sorry about any transfers .
#id=5
#text=The bus ride cost me $ 1.25 and transfers where an additional 50 cents .
#id=6
#text=Many people rode the bus and I meet several nice people on the bus .
#id=7
#text=The bus drivers were always nice and I became friends with several of them .
#id=8
#text=The bus only came once an hour and I had to make sure I did not miss it if I was going to work because then I would be late for work .
#id=9
#text=The bus always made a stop at the main depot in order to pick up more people .
#text=There was usually about a 20 minute wait so the driver could have break in the late afternoon .
#text=I did not like having to take the bus but it served my purpose for a while and I was thankful to have the bus available .
